```{r}
library(MASS)
a <- read.table("http://www.stat.ucla.edu/~nchristo/statistics100c/restaurant.txt",
                header = T)
x <- matrix(c(rep(1,100),a$food,a$decor, a$ser), nrow=100, ncol=4)
x_transpose_x <- (t(x) %*% x) ;x_transpose_x 
y <- matrix(a$cost)
beta_hat = ginv(x_transpose_x) %*% t(x) %*% y;beta_hat
lm(cost ~ ., data= a)
H <- x %*% ginv(x_transpose_x) %*% t(x)
H[1:5,1:5]

```
